series.title: Still Buffering
series.author: Sydnee McElroy, Rileigh Smirl and Teylor Smirl

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to News
episodes.summary:
What better time to discuss the news than now? This week, the sisters tackle the huge differences between how teens got their news in the 90's and how they get it now. From real deal newspapers and magazines to Twitter hashtags and online magazines, the trio has covered it all while keeping in mind the truth is...out there. 

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Tell the Future
episodes.summary:
In celebration of our favorite Mother Collective's birthday, the sisters have decided to tackle a topic both themselves and their mom are very interested in, telling the future (ooooh.) From zodiac signs to cootie catchers, the sisters cover it all, including a very lengthy discussion about Barbie MASH and owning a pet chameleon. So Happy Birthday to Mother Collective, and happy fortune telling and spell casting to all of you!

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Dating (Part 2)
episodes.summary:
Happy Valentine's Day! To celebrate this (kinda sucky) day, the sisters continue their conversation on dating that they started many months ago. Last time, they covered how teens start dating and "talking to" someone, and now they're here to tell you how to go on the most successful teen dates throughout the years, from ample parking space dates to "Netflix and chilling." We hope you have a decent Valentine's Day and don't eat any of those chalky conversation hearts (even though Teylor loves them.)

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Internet Videos
episodes.summary:
Since the older sisters and many more teens of yesterday have been dying to know, this week, Rileigh finally explains YouTube and all of its secrets. From why teen girls want to know what other teen girls just bought at the store to how to make that sweet sweet YouTube money, Rileigh covers it all while the oldest Smirl girls reminisce on the first viral internet videos. Oh and there's a cat in this episode too.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Fan
episodes.summary:
Even though the beginning of this week's episode sounds like we've started a new Riverdale fan/hatecast, I promise we haven't, we just get really passionate about Archie and teen dramas. Since we needed to discuss the legitimacy of this new show, we thought it would be fitting to discuss the idea of fan-ing out over celebrities, and find out that all three of us have done some somewhat creepy-ish things over the years...

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Birth Control
episodes.summary:
In this week's very timely episode, the sisters discuss a somewhat more sensitive topic (and one that makes Rileigh very uncomfortable at times), birth control. Since birth control is a phrase most all teenagers have had to hear or even experience at some point in their lives, the sisters thought this discussion would shed some light on the stigma and social acceptability of birth control throughout the years. Also, there's a lot of butt talk this episode so...there's that. 

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: A Quick Apology
episodes.summary:
Hey everybody. We just wanted to take a second to apologize for the less than great audio quality of this week's episode. We're sorry if it made it hard to listen, and we'll be back with a much clearer episode next week. Thank you for understanding. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Snow Days
episodes.summary:
As the cold, dreary winter season continues to make life a little bit worse for everybody, the sisters reflect on one of the only enjoyable factors of winter during school, snow days. From the trio's combined hatred of winter sports, to the pure joy they all felt when waking up to find school had been cancelled, to learning some surprising slang terms for snow, the sisters have covered all the bases this week and hope you can relate to at least one of those feelings. (Also, it's been one year since Still Buffering began! Thank you all for your continued support and love.)

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Jobs
episodes.summary:
We aren't really sure what happened this week, we planned on talking about jobs and somehow the majority of this episode is about troll butts, Batman pizza, and Sydnee's new boat life. So...we tried to stay on topic and we hope you gain at least a bit of insight about teen jobs (but that might be hard to do.)

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to New Year
episodes.summary:
Happy New Year from the Smirl sisters to you! It's finally 2017, and we're all happy that 2016 is over. But, is New Year's even really a holiday when you're a teen, and how do teens actually celebrate it when they can't party and none of them have the "sacrificial parent?" I guess they could have musical theatre nerd parties like Sydnee did (but they sound kinda lame.) Find out the answers to all of these and more on this week's episode, and join us in ringing in the New Year!

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Shopping
episodes.summary:
As the holiday season comes to a close, it's time to think about what the most important thing is to do after you receive all of those lovely, thoughtful holiday presents...return them all. This week the sisters try to determine a set of rules for returning and re-gifting presents from the holidays and realize that Claire's is a never-ending, sacrificial pit of food-shaped earrings and fake glasses.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Holidays
episodes.summary:
It's the most wonderful time of the year yet again, and we want to celebrate with you! Come join us as we decide what the best holiday movies, music, and traditions are and make some classic holiday season goofs. (And Sydnee does this whole bit with a pen but you don't have to laugh no one is really sure why she did it) Merry Mid-Darkmas to you and yours!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Standardized Testing
episodes.summary:
As the testing season begins for most high schoolers (including Rileigh), the sisters remember some of their favorite memories of school tests and college-entry tests and try to give their youngest and most stressed out sister some advice. Which seems to include a lot of talk about...power donuts?

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Video Games with Justin McElroy!
episodes.summary:
This week, the sisters are joined by a very special guest who knows more about video games than anyone they know, America's favorite oldest brother, Justin McElroy! Join us as we take a journey through the ever-changing world of video games and learn that Justin's teen experience would be described as...there?

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How (Not) to Bully
episodes.summary:
In another special late-night edition of the show, the sisters tackle a more serious topic: bullying. All three have many stories to share, many of them about bullies that were surprisingly thorough and dedicated to their bits. But don't worry, the sisters have moved on from those terrible middle school days and are ready to goof about them and hopefully help some of you who may be dealing with some bullies right now. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Turkey
episodes.summary: It's Turkey Season! So join the sisters in discussing some of the best holiday traditions and figuring out who all of the people in their family are. Are they the only ones with randos at their Thanksgiving? Or maybe are they the only family too awkward to say anything? Find out the answers to these questions and more on this special Turkey episode! (Gobble gobble)

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Homework
episodes.summary:
Rileigh has a ton of homework to do, so to help her, her sisters decided to talk about homework for an hour with her, which doesn't really help with the fact she has a lot of work to do, but it was fun! So join the sisters in recounting some of their favorite...and not so favorite school assignments and projects all while hearing about the countless times they incorporated food into their assignments.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Hair Removal
episodes.summary:
This week, the sisters set out to answer a question that's been a staple of the show's description since the beginning, what do I do with all this hair everywhere? Teylo becomes the resident history buff and Rileigh shares a pretty in depth description of her leg post-cast. It sure is a weird one this week, but it's what we all need right about now.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Vote
episodes.summary:
It may be November now, but it's still spooky in the States for at least another week since it's the spookiest season of them all...Election Season! In celebration of the upcoming election, the sisters wanted to give everyone a bit of help just so you know exactly how to vote (since it's super important!) And Rileigh explains why Thanksgiving is just Pre-Christmas too, so Merry Christmas/Election Season everyone!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Halloween Costumes
episodes.summary:
As the spooky season comes to a close, the sisters take a minute to reflect on their past Halloween costumes and some of the most popular ones from their times and share what they're going to be for this Halloween. But, there's also a very extensive conversation about the existence of a sexy poop emoji costume. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Monsters
episodes.summary:
As a continuation of the sisters' month long celebration of the spookiest month of the year, this week, they discussed all of their favorite monsters! From vampire vs werewolf stereotypes and who the best witch is, they discussed it all. They even decided which kind of monster they think they would be if they were one, and the answers aren't really all that surprising, if you know these sisters. 

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Scary Movies
episodes.summary: It's officially spooky season! Or as Rileigh would call it, "spoopy" season. To celebrate this most wonderful time of the year, the sisters discuss some of their most favorite scary movies and tv series, where we learn Sydnee has been the victim of some pretty spooky baby monitor pranks.

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Late Nights
episodes.summary: This week, Sydnee and Teylor realize that Rileigh is like an old person when it comes to sleep, which is to say, she loves it and needs to go to bed early and sleep late every day. In order to break her of these habits, the older sisters recount their favorite late night activities, which apparently include minor misdemeanors?

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to School Spirit
episodes.summary:
It's spirit week and you know what that means! It's time for Pajama Day, Character Day, and...a day to dress as a giant pink hard candy? As the older sisters take a journey back through their experiences with spirit week and pep rallies, they try to advice Rileigh on how she should dress for her spirit week, but it doesn't seem like she's going to be taking their advice. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Hobbies
episodes.summary: Join the sisters in celebrating this week, as the babiest Smirl Girl has finally gotten her driver's license! To commemorate this momentous occasion, the sisters talk about some of their favorite things from their teen years to do for fun! Because what's not celebratory about sweaty hemp chokers and Tamagotchi poop?

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Driving
episodes.summary: Sadly, the littlest of the sisters has had a rough weekend, after failing her driver's test and missing out on a party with her friends. But not to fear! Her sisters are here to share their driving mishaps and misfortunes, including the answer behind why Syd's car always smelled like meat and what song Tey hated so much it caused a wreck.

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Slang
episodes.summary:
In this week's much anticipated episode, the sisters finally figure out what all of the new hot teen slang words of today mean! And in doing so, they create their own Smirl Girl Dictionary which includes a few questionable words. Huzzah!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Sweet Sixteen
episodes.summary: It's the littlest Smirl sister's 16th birthday! In order to celebrate, the older sisters recount their own sixteenth birthday parties which seem to include an odd amount of psychological terror. So light those candles and get to partying with all three of the coolest sisters around!

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Board Games
episodes.summary:
The sisters are (sadly) home from vacation this week, but good news! They played some old school board games and they're so ready to talk all about them. And, for the first time in Still Buffering history, there's a video companion to this episode of the sisters playing these games on Rileigh's YouTube channel!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Cartoons
episodes.summary:
Join the sisters this week as they take you on a journey through some of their favorite cartoons of the past and the present. And they all got new nicknames, now with alliteration! (Except for Rileigh's but it's still pretty good.)

Subscribe on iTunes or RSS!

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Back to School
episodes.summary: As summer vacation sadly comes to an end for the youngest Smirl Sister, all three recount their favorite parts about going back to school, and maybe their not so favorite parts too. And Sydnee also shares her lifelong first day of school fantasy that includes background music and sunglasses...yeah this episode gets a little weird.

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Body Image
episodes.summary:
This week, the sisters got a tad more serious than they are in their usual episodes, but with all three of them having personal experiences and troubles with this topic, it was something they felt needed to be discussed. But don't worry, there are still goofs as they try to crack FaceBook algorithms and why they always show Teylor cupcakes.

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Slumber Party
episodes.summary:
Let's have a slumber party! (Rileigh insists that no one calls it that anymore and will only refer to them as sleep-overs, but guess who's in charge of the text this week?) Sleeping bags are so out, prank calls are more complicated, but we can always agree that parents who buy donuts in the morning rule.

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How To Rom-Com
episodes.summary:
Join the trio of sisters in their discussion of the most popular and their most favorite teen romantic comedies. And if you were wondering what in the world was happening between Kanye and Taylor Swift, don't worry, they have you covered on that too. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Break-Ups
episodes.summary:
The sisters really tap into their teen angst this week while they recount break-ups, then and now. Also, what are the best break-up songs and is it ok to break-up in a text using only emojis?

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Food
episodes.summary:
This week, the sisters discuss all of their favorite foods from their pre-teen and teen years, and collectively realize how gross most of them really were. Also, from the same sisters that gave you Teddy Chair, comes their newest hit product, and you get to hear them create it!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Theatre with Lin-Manuel Miranda!
episodes.summary:
The sisters are joined this week by very special guest, Lin-Manuel Miranda to reminisce about the agony and the ecstasy that is the world of high school theatre. Also, just a head's up, the A word is said in this episode. But only like twice.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Room
episodes.summary:
Ever wondered how a cool teen would decorate their room nowadays? No worries, the sisters have you covered! Join the trio on their journey through their past rooms filled with black lights, inflatable furniture, and fake plants.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Cope
episodes.summary:
The world is scary for adults. How must it feel to teens? Rileigh offers us some insight this week. We'll be funny again next week, I promise. Let's just hug and love each other right now. Warning: This episode contains discussions of violence which may be triggering.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: How to Dares
episodes.summary:
Join the sisters for their first-ever live show from the PlayStation Theater in New York City. Not only are classic dares and the latest YouTube dares discussed, you'll actually get to hear the girls attempt some of them. Chubby Bunny!

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Sports
episodes.summary:
The trio of sisters is joined this week by their dad, Low Country Tom, to discuss something their dad has helped all of them with throughout the years, sports! 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to End of Year
episodes.summary:
As Rileigh's sophomore year of high school comes to a close, all three of the sisters reflect on their past last days of school. And Teylor and Sydnee share their sisterly stories of sacrifice and all of the times they all three missed school and were late. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Question Time
episodes.summary: This week, Rileigh helps to answer all of your most pressing questions about teen life of today. Then the sisters go and talk about carrier pigeons and what "wall ball" really is for a large portion of this episode, but they still answer your questions!

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Fashion
episodes.summary: This week, the sisters take a journey through their past closets and end up just doing a lot of making fun of each others' fashion senses. And then of course Rileigh makes a Friends reference every chance she gets.

episodes.title: How to Family Vacation
episodes.summary:
This week, the Smirl sisters are joined by another guest star direct from Taiwan: Their cousin Kyle (or West Virginia Caveman) to talk about family vacations. 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Make Friends
episodes.summary:
This week, the trio of Smirl Girls take on a slightly more serious topic that has troubled all three through their teen years, making friends. And then they lighten the mood by talking about their new Friends (the TV show) FanCast and the Great Huntington Poop Strike of 2016.

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How To Books
episodes.summary:
The third Smirl sister, Teylor, is back again this week to discuss one of the trio's favorite hobbies, reading. Join the sisters as they discuss their favorite books, past required reading for school, and somehow end up connecting the world of Grease to that of Harry Potter.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Nerd
episodes.summary:
The trilogy of Smirl Sisters is finally completed this week with the addition of Teylor! As the coolest nerd we know, Tey has some advice for Rilo on how to find her tribe and Syd tries to convince her to embrace her inner tardigrade. Oh, and there is a lot of Sailor Moon talk. I mean, a lot.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Makeup
episodes.summary:
This week Sydnee subjects Rileigh to a 90's makeover and Rileigh explains what a glitter beard is. Also, Rileigh tells the best story about twerking and civil disobedience that anyone has ever told. To be fair, it is probably the only story about twerking and civil disobedience that anyone has ever told.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How (Not) to Party
episodes.summary:
This week we update you on Rileigh's party status and a brush with law enforcement. We also welcome our coolest uncle, Scampi Mike to help tell Rileigh where she went wrong.

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Music
episodes.summary:
Rileigh and Sydnee swapped playlists and are ready to take you on a tour of teen music, from the arduous years of cassette rewinding to the dangerous game (that we certainly never played) of illegally downloading music. Also, Rileigh had never heard of a VJ.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Movie
episodes.summary:
Sydnee and Rileigh watched Mallrats together so Sydnee can reminisce about the glory days of the mall.  Also, these kids just don't watch movies anymore.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Dating (Part 1)
episodes.summary:
This week, Rileigh and Sydnee navigate the difficult concept of "talking to" someone. Then, Sydnee makes Rileigh really uncomfortable when she tries to recreate her "Are you my boyfriend?" speech. 

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Dress (Code)
episodes.summary:
This week, the sisters dissect the history of the dress code because, well, honestly, Rileigh just really wants to be allowed to wear yoga pants to school.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Health Class (Sex Ed)
episodes.summary:
This week, Sydnee forces Rileigh to talk about sex ed and she is not comfortable with it.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Memory
episodes.summary:
Rileigh and Sydnee try to figure out the best way to record your teenage memories, assuming you want to, and then Rileigh confuses Sydnee with the rules of Instagram and Snapchat

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Valentine
episodes.summary:
Rileigh and Sydnee find common ground on this week's episode as they reminisce about the days when everybody had to give you a Valentine and debate the best candy. They even share a more serious sister-to-sister conversation about how far teens have come in accepting one another. Then Rileigh has to go and make fun of Sydnee's sweaters again.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: How to Communication
episodes.summary:
From land lines and pagers to subtweeting and group texting, Rileigh and Sydnee attempt to find common ground in the many ways teenagers have found to talk to each other without ever having to venture from their bedrooms.

 

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering: How to Party
episodes.summary:
Join real-life sisters Sydnee McElroy (Sawbones) and Rileigh Smirl as they help bridge the gap between the teenagers of yesterday and today. To celebrate their first episode, the sisters throw themselves a cross-generational high school party, complete with both giant CD cases and turnt teens.
 
Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas

episodes.title: Still Buffering Trailer
episodes.summary:
Join real-life sisters Sydnee McElroy (Sawbones) and Rileigh Smirl as they help bridge the gap between the teenagers of yesterday and today. "How do you party?" "What do I do with all this hair?" Still Buffering has the answer.

Music: "Baby You Change Your Mind" by Nouvellas
